item.title: How crowded is Columbia Dining right now
Goal of Financial Freedom is not Idleness
item.description: FIRE Today, one of the key goals I hear from my peers is the goal to FIRE (Financially independent, retire early). There have been many proponents of it, and many detractors as well. Yet, one of the main reasons we hear why people want to retire is so they can wake up whenever they want, eat whatever they want, and travel wherever they want. See the world and chill. Yet, we often hear from the other side that people who have reached FIRE find life to be dull, boring even, as if their life surmounts to nothing.

item.title: How to debug Pytorch/Deep Learning in VSCode
item.description: Debugging a PyTorch Script in Jupyter Notebook Here is a youtube guide video! Open the Notebook: Open your .ipynb file directly in VSCode. Insert Breakpoints: In the margin next to the cell numbers, click to set breakpoints. Start the Jupyter Server: If you haven’t already, start the Jupyter server by running a cell. Run the Cell in Debug Mode: Right-click on the cell with a breakpoint and select “Debug Cell” from the context menu.

item.title: Reimagining an affordable Blockchain-based Insurance
item.description: Insurance Origin of Insurance You’re a sailor in 17th century Great Britain. Sailing the 7 seas for gold, gospel, and glory. Yet with all the treasures and adventure of sailing, it came with significant risks. With pirates lurking around for booties, lousy hygiene on board, terrible treatment to most sailors, unpredictable storms, and little to no healthcare on board, it’s not far-fetch to say a significant amount of sailors don’t return alive.
